title: Monkey Shines
description: The suspenseful and haunting story of a relationship between a man and a monkey that turns from love and companionship to terror and dependency. Allan, a bright Oxfordlaw student and outstanding athlete, is suddenly left paralyzed by an accident. Ella, a laboratory monkey involved in tests to increase learning ability and intelligence,is enlisted to aid in his recovery. As the minds of the two become increasingly intertwined, this unusual bond becomes more ambiguous and, finally, lethal.
author: Michael      Stewart
